title: Billy the Kid in Santa Fe

sources.title: Billy the Kid in Santa Fe
sources.description: A P.R.C. western featuring Bob Steele, Al St. John, Rex Lease, and Dave O'Brien.

sources.title: Billy The Kid in Santa Fe (1941) BOB STEELE
sources.description:
Stars: Bob Steele, Al St. John, Rex Lease |
Director: Sam Newfield (as Sherman Scott)

After being framed for murder, Billy escapes jail with the help of his pals Jeff and Fuzzy. They travel to Santa Fe where they meet up again with Joe Benson, the man paid by Barton to lie at Billy's trial. This time Joe is framed for murder.

metadata.Plot: After being framed for murder, Billy escapes jail with the help of his pals Jeff and Fuzzy. They travel to Santa Fe where they meet up again with Joe Benson, the man paid by Barton to lie at Billy's trial. This time Joe is framed for murder.
metadata.Actors: Bob Steele, Al St. John, Rex Lease
